sourcesContent:
<template>
  <nav>
    <router-link to="/">Home</router-link> |
    <router-link to="/about">About</router-link>
  </nav>
  <router-view/>
</template>

<style>
$blue: rgb(27, 27, 126);
$black: black;
$bg: rgba(128, 152, 204, 0.534);
$white: white;
$grey: rgb(34, 26, 26);

@mixin flex($flex-direction: row){
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: $flex-direction ;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    justify-content: space-between;
    margin: auto;
}

@mixin button{
    background-color: $bg;
    color: white;
    border: 1px solid;
    border-radius: 30px;
    height: 35px;

    width: auto;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: 500ms ease-in-out;
}

@mixin input{
    width: 120px;
    height: 25px;
    border: 1px solid $black;
}

@mixin select{
    width: 120px;
    height: 25px;
    border: 1px solid $black;
}

li{
    list-style: none;
}

a{
    text-decoration: none;
}

a:hover{
    color: $blue;
}



html, body{
    box-sizing: border-box;
    line-height: 1.5em;
    font-size: 1.1em;
}

button{
    @include button();
}

input{
    @include input();
}

select{
    @include select();
}

button:hover{
    transform: scale(1.1);
}

.main{
    display: block;
    background-color: $bg;
}

.nav{
    width: 100%;
    background-color: aliceblue;

    @include flex();

    &__logo{
        float: left;
        img{
            float: left;
            margin: 10px auto auto 20px;
        }
    }

    &__menu{
        text-align: center;

        li{
            display: inline;
            margin: 5px;

            a{
                color: black;
            }

            a:hover{
                color: $blue;
            }
        }
    }

    &__login{
        float: right;
        ul{
            li{
                display: inline;
                margin: 5px;
                a{
                    color: $black;
                }
            }
        }

    }
}

.top{
    height: 350px;
    margin: 30px auto;
    @include flex();
    width: 80%;
    text-align: left;
    padding-top: 90px;


    &__text{
        text-align: left;
        flex: 1;
        width: 80%;
        margin: auto;
        padding-right: 30px;


        &__title{
            color: $blue;
            font-size: 2.2em;
            font-weight: bold;
        }

        &__text{
            font-size: 1em;
        }

        &__subtitle{
            font-size: 1.2em;
        }

        &__items{
            text-align: left;
            margin: auto 0;
            li{
                display: inline;
                margin: 10px;
                text-align: left;
            }
        }
    }

    &__image{
        flex: 1;
        &__box{
            @include flex;
            justify-content: no;
            margin: 90px auto;
            img{
                width: 150px;
                height: auto;
                margin: auto;
                flex: 1;
            }
        }
    }
}

.reasons{
    @include flex(column);
    text-align: center;
    width: 100%;
    margin: 70px auto;

    &__title{
        color: purple;
        text-align: center;
        font-size: 1.9em;
    }

    &__sections{
        @include flex();
        width: 80%;

        &__box{
            flex: 1;
            text-align: center;

            .box-img{
                background-color: rgb(212, 194, 212);
                width: 50px;
                height: 50px;
                border-radius: 40px;
                margin: auto;
                text-align: center;
                position: relative;

                p{
                    position: absolute;
                    left: 0;
                    right: 0;
                }
            }

            p{

            }


        }

    }
}

.simulator{
    @include flex(column);
    background-color: rgb(178, 178, 185);
    text-align: center;
    height: 190px;
    padding-bottom: 30px;
    padding-top: 30px;
    width: 100%;
    margin: 30px auto;

    h3{
        font-size: 1.9em;
    }

    &__text{
        margin: -30px auto;
    }



    &__buttons{
        @include flex;

        form{
            flex: 1;
            margin: 10px;
        }
    }
}

.about{
    @include flex();
    text-align: center;

    &__left{
        padding-top: 50px;
        flex: 1;
        &__title{
            color: purple;
            font-size: 1.9em;
        }

        &__text{
            width: 80%;
            margin: auto;
            text-align: left;
        }

        &__btn{
            @include button;
            margin: 20px auto;
    }
    }

    &__img{
        flex: 1;
        img{
            width: 80%;
        }
    }
}

.care{
    @include flex();
    width: 80%;

    .card{
        flex: 1;
        margin: auto;
        @include flex;

        &__icon{
            text-align: center;
            position: relative;
            i{
                font-size: 3em;
                width: 30%;
                position: absolute;
                left: 0;
                right: 0;;
            }
        }

        &__text{
            width: 70%;
            &__title{

            }

            &__text{
                width: 80%;
                text-align: left;
            }
        }
    }
}

.payments{
    @include flex(column);
    height: 300px;
    width: 100%;

    &__title{
        text-align: center;
    }

    &__items{
        text-align: center;
        @include flex;
        width: 100%;

        &__item{
            margin: auto;

            img{
                width: 150px;
                height: 150px;
                border-radius: 50px;
                margin: auto;
            }
        }
    }
}

.login{
    margin:35px auto;
    width: 500px;
    display: block;
    background-color: $blue;
    text-align: center;

    &__top{
        width: 120px;
        height: 70px;
        margin: auto;
    }

    &__text{
        color: $white;
        font-weight: bold;
    }

    &__items{
        @include flex();
        width: 80%;
        flex-direction: row;
        margin: 20px auto;

        input{
            width: 100%;
        }

        select{
            @include select;
        }

        label{
            text-align: left;
        }
    }
}

.dashboard{
    display: block;
    &__top{
        background-color: $white;
        @include flex();
    }

    &__main{
        @include flex();

        &__menu{
            width: 25%;
            float: left;
            background-color: $grey;
            display: block;

            ul{
                li{
                    display: block;

                    a{
                        color: $white;
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

    &__content{
        .infos{
            width: 350px;
            margin: 20px auto auto 0;
            border: 1px solid $black;
            display: block;

            &__top{
                text-align: left;
                h2{

                }
            }

            &__curr{
                display: block;

                .curr-top{
                    color: red;

                    span{
                        float: right;
                    }
                }
            }
        }

        .history{
            width: 80%
        }
    }
}

.footer{
    @include flex();

    &__item{
        flex: 1;

        ul{
            li{
                display: block;

                h4{
                    font-weight: bold;
                }
            }
        }
    }
}</style>
